title: Steppeflower
description: Warp printed & woven. Chintz finish.  3 puffy plumes repeated in staggered rows.  Vert. rpt. 29\"; horiz. 50.5\". Warp printed & woven in Switzerland, chintz finish. Drk. sage green bkg with 3 puffy plumes (white, blue, lilac) repeated in staggered rows.  vert. rpt. 29\", horiz. rpt. 50 1/2\" Sage
